original_text: Many nations and great kings will have power over the king of Babylon and his people. The Babylonians will become their slaves. In that way, I will punish the Babylonians for all the bad things that they did to my people.” ’
korean_text: 그리하여 여러 민족과 큰 왕들이 그들로 자기들을 섬기게 할 것이나 나는 그들의 행위와 그들의 손이 행한 대로 갚으리라

sentences.original_text: Many nations will have power over the king of Babylon
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 나라들이 바빌론 왕에게 권세를 가질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and great kings will have power over his people
sentences.korean_translation: 위대한 왕들이 그 백성에게 권세를 가질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The Babylonians will become their slaves
sentences.korean_translation: 바빌론 사람들은 그들의 노예가 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: In that way, I will punish the Babylonians
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 내가 바빌론 사람들을 벌할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: for all the bad things that they did to my people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내 백성에게 행한 모든 나쁜 일들 때문에
